channel.title: Macroing For online mmorpgs using visual or .net
channel.description: I found a thread from a while back discussing Macros/bots for runescape such as the ones like miner/banker woodcutter/banker any/banker/droper, im pretty sure the last reply to it a guy said he had one on this website Moparistthebest.com and i followed the url but it didnt exsist any more or it said i might not have access the thread was posted in 2007 ill give u the links to show you what im talking about ::: http://www.sythe.org/archive/index.php/index.php?t-154170.html <~~ this is the one to the thread on this site. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49.0.html So I basicly have 2 questions. 1) where to find a vb 6.0 or vb.net compiler? 2) if anybody knows any good scripts/source code from a previous project to a RS macro that i coverd earlier preferabley vb 6.0 minning any ore such ass essance mith coal iron steel gold or wood cutting macros?

item.title: Macroing For online mmorpgs using visual or .net
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:5, topic:283296”]They aren’t talking about a written-from-scratch VB cheat. They are talking about a script a former member here used to sell for the program SCAR. You can still download SCAR for free and write scripts for it to do about whatever you want.

As you can see there are many SCAR related boards on this forum where you can get scripts, examples, and programming help. Does that answer your question?[/quote]…Is this even in the right section?

Read full topic
item.source: Macroing For online mmorpgs using visual or .net

item.title: Macroing For online mmorpgs using visual or .net
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

They aren’t talking about a written-from-scratch VB cheat. They are talking about a script a former member here used to sell for the program SCAR. You can still download SCAR for free and write scripts for it to do about whatever you want.

As you can see there are many SCAR related boards on this forum where you can get scripts, examples, and programming help. Does that answer your question?

Read full topic
item.source: Macroing For online mmorpgs using visual or .net

item.title: Macroing For online mmorpgs using visual or .net
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

[quote=“MccFatPirate34, post:1, topic:283296”]I found a thread from a while back discussing Macros/bots for runescape such as the ones like miner/banker woodcutter/banker any/banker/droper.
im pretty sure the last reply to it a guy said he had one on this website Moparistthebest.com and i followed the url, but it didnt exsist any more or it said i might not have access.
the thread was posted in 2007, ill give u the links to show you what im talking about:

http://www.sythe.org/archive/index.php/index.php?t-154170.html <~~ this is the one to the thread on this site.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49.0.html

So I basicly have 2 questions:

  1. where to find a vb 6.0 or vb.net compiler?
  2. if anybody knows any good scripts/source code from a previous project to a RS macro that i coverd earlier, preferabley vb 6.0, minning any ore such ass essance mith coal iron steel gold or wood cutting macros?[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Macroing For online mmorpgs using visual or .net
